name: assignment-no-1
description: Your assignment for the week is:  - Print a message like "Hey Abu Hurairah, I have started learning TYPESCRIPT."  - Store your name in a variable and print it.  - Store 10 numbers in different variables.    - Add all of them and print the SUM.    - Print the Difference (subtraction).    - Print the result after multiplying all.  - Take two numbers and print the division result.  - Now, perform all four operations with the given numbers, print the results, and observe the order in which the operations take place.
